participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and laid-back, enjoys outdoor activities and is passionate about personal fitness.
participant_1.background: My weight is irrelevant. I go fishing on the weekends to relax. I practice martial arts regularly to stay in shape and defend myself. I am twenty one years old. I like to fish.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and nurturing, loves nature and enjoys expressing herself creatively.
participant_2.background: I want to find a companion to share my love of Christmas with. I enjoy getting my nails done as a way to relax and pamper myself. I love nature and my rose garden is one of my favorite places to be. I like spending time with friends playing sports and going to country concerts. I love the feeling of being free to speak my mind, even if it is not always appropriate.

content.text: Hey, I'm doing well! Just got back from getting my nails done.
Oh fun! I love getting my nails done too. It's so relaxing and pampering.
Me too! I always feel so refreshed afterwards.
Where do you like to go for your nails?
I usually go to this little salon down the street from my house. They're really good and they always have a great selection of colors.
Oh nice! I'll have to check them out sometime.
Yeah, you should! They're really great.
So what else do you like to do for fun?
I love spending time in nature. I have a rose garden in my backyard that I love to take care of.
That's so cool! I love roses. They're such beautiful flowers.
So what do you like to do in your spare time?
I like to go fishing, go to country concerts, and spend time with my friends.
Fishing sounds like fun! I've never been fishing before, but I've always wanted to try it.
You should! It's really relaxing and you can catch some really great fish.
Maybe I will! I'm going to have to go check out that salon you were talking about.
Yeah, you should! They're really great.
